Package controller

Class CustomersController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.Controller
      • controller.TablePaneController<Customer>
        • controller.CustomersController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Refreshable
    public class CustomersController
extends TablePaneController<Customer>
    Manages the customers tab on the main window, which displays a table of all customers. It implements the add, modify, delete, and refresh buttons for customers.
    Author:
    Joseph T. Lapp

        Handles a user request to delete a customer.

        LAMBDA - This lambda prevents me from having to write another method, which I would have passed to deleteSelection() instead. Moreover, the lambda makes the intended behavior clearer by showing it directly alongside the operation -- deleteSelection() -- that employs the method.
